Sanguine Retreat no longer resets air jumps & dashes

Love Bites T3 stamina cost increased

Mirage.description: Fire Scarabs max health steal increased from 37 to 45
Traveler can now target friendly objectives
Traveler T1 now also reduces cooldown by 25s

Paige.description: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.66 to 0.52
Defend and Fight! barrier reduced from 200 to 150
Defend and Fight! duration reduced from 7s to 5s

Defend and Fight! T2 now grants +2s duration

Paradox.description: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.27 to 0.22
Health per boon reduced from 47 to 45

Flying Cloak T2 increased from +75 to +85

Seven.description: Lightning Ball radius increased from 3.5m to 4.25m

Killing Blow Rage damage bonus reduced from 17% to 15%
Killing Blow T2 Rage bonus reduced from 8% to 6%
Rage generale now increases your self-knockback on alt fire
Fixed bugs with Barriers and Spirit Damage Scaling

Sinclair.description: Spectral Assistant swaps increased from 1 to 2
Audience Participation cooldown reduced from 50% to 40%

Splatter T2 changed from "+45 Damage and +1m Radius" to "-12s Cooldown"

The Cube duration reduced from 4s to 3s
The Cube regen increased from 30 to 40
The Cube T2 now grants +1s duration

Vyper.description: Health per boon increased from 33 to 35

Alchemical Flask radius reduced from 6.5m to 5.5m
Alchemical Flask T2 now also grants +1m radius

Weapon.description: Bullet Velocity increased from +45% to +50% (affects upgrades)
Spirit power scaling increased from 0.75 to 0.8
Now provides Weapon Damage instead of Fire Rate
Weapon Damage now scales with boons (+2)
Secondary Fire Weapon Damage now scales with boons (+1)
Secondary Fire Weapon Damage reduced from 75% to 45%
Shock damage spirit power growth increased from 0.14 to 0.19
Shock damage spirit power growth increased from 0.14 to 0.19
No longer dispels buffs (moved to Curse)
Slow debuff now prevents stamina usage and silences movement abilities
Full invisibility distance reduced from 50m to 30m
Fire Rate per stack increased from 10% to 12%

Vitality.description: Removes all non-stun debuffs on proc

Spirit.description: Bullet Resist Reduction reduced from 13% to 12%
Cooldown reduced from 35s to 25s (matches Focus Lens)
No longer upgrades from Spirit Sap
No longer reduces Spirit Resistance or Spirit Power
Now deals 100 Impact Damage (0.3 spirit power growth)
Now reduces Spirit Snatch effects to 70% effectiveness instead of increasing cooldown to 2x on light melee hit
Now reduces Spirit Resistance by 12% and reduces Spirit Power by 30 for 12s
Now grants +5% Ability Range (no longer has the +5% CD Reduction)
Max Health damage per second increased from 3.25% to 3.5%

Gameplay.description: Trooper bounty mechanics have been reworked. The first half of the souls still fly out as deniable orb, however rather than the other half being instantly given to nearby players it will fall to the ground as an orb that you need to get near to pick up. It has a 18m capture radius where it'll travel to you once you get within. Only one player needs to claim it, share rules remain the same as before.
Ground orbs last for 18 seconds, with duration increasing by 2 seconds per minute up to 40 seconds after 10 minutes.
Enemy orbs are visible as faint colorless soul orbs to your team but cannot be claimed.
Amount of souls in the flying orb that can be secured or denied reduced from 50% to 40%.
Very small tweaks made to the secure and deny lag calculation to improve it.
Trooper range for soul drop consideration increased from 35m to 45m.
Medic troopers no longer have a passive healing pulse ability.

Medic troopers now drop a medic pack on death. It has the same pickup range and duration mechanics as soul orbs. Heals everyone in a 30m radius for 10% missing health plus 75, plus 2 per minute of game time.
Starting souls count increased from 400 to 600.
Trooper bounty values increased by 10%.
Trooper bounty split ratios updated from 1/0.65/0.28/0.15/0.12/0.08 to 1/0.54/0.36/0.25/0.2/0.16.
Reworked the position of the player camera and various visibility-related details.
Neutrals bounty increased by 10%.
Neutrals HP increased by 15%.
Small neutrals damage increased by 15%.
Small neutral camp respawn time reduced from 180 seconds to 120 seconds.
Medium neutrals spirit resist increased from 30% to 40%.
Medium neutrals damage increased by 25%.
Hard neutrals spirit resist increased from 35% to 50%.
Hard neutrals damage increased by 30%.
Sinner's Sacrifice return damage increased from 60 to 80.
Minimum unsecured gold required to drop increased from 100 to 150.
Sprint and out-of-combat regen timer versus neutrals increased from 0.5s to 2.5s.
All AP damage upgrades reduced by 10%.
Base gun damage and gun damage growth increased by 10% (excluding Paige).
Headshot multiplier reduced from 1.8x to 1.65x.
Weapon Investment Bonuses now grant +20% Weapon Damage at 4800 souls spent.
Vitality Investment Bonuses now grant +12% Bonus Health at 4800 souls spent.
Spirit Investment Bonuses now grant +20 Spirit Power at 4800 souls spent.
Added UI highlight to the 4800 reward row of the investment bonuses.
Initial wall jump now costs 0.25 stamina.
Stamina regeneration rate reduced by 5% (from 5 seconds to 5.25 seconds).
After 35 minutes, all troopers gain +50% HP.
Guardian HP increased from 3500 to 4250.
Walker HP increased by 40%.
Walkers on side lanes now have the same HP as midlane walkers (previously ~37% less).
Walker engagement ranges reduced (attack, being attacked, stomps, etc.).
Walker stomp cooldown reduced from 10s to 6s.
Walker stomp damage increased from 350 + 10% max HP to 350 + 15% max HP.
Walker fireball radius increased from 5m to 6m.
Walker fireball debuff now lingers for 4 seconds.
Walker fireballs now reduce bullet and spirit resistance by 10%.
Walker area in mid lane adjusted.
Bullet damage is no longer reduced by 35% of a hero's base bullet damage against Tier 1 turrets.
Guardians now start with 75% damage resist which decays to -50% over the first 10 minutes.
Walkers now start with 75% damage resist which decays to -50% over the first 20 minutes.
Base slot count increased from 8 to 9; Flex slot count reduced from 4 to 3. One flex slot is granted per Walker kill. Previously slots were granted via Guardians/Walkers milestones.
Rejuv buff no longer grants +10% Max HP, +15% Fire Rate, or +15% Spirit Damage Amp.
Mid Boss base HP increased from 13,000 to 14,000.
Mid Boss HP growth per minute increased from 200 to 230.
Team that kills Mid Boss receives +2 permanent buffs per player.
Dropping or throwing the Urn now causes Parry to go on cooldown.
Soul Urn no longer grants +1 AP to the person depositing it.
Soul Urn now grants 4 permanent buffs to the depositing player.
Two new levels added at 47k and 49k souls to allow all ability upgrades.
Jump Pad stun window increased from 0.6s to 0.9s.
When meleeing an enemy who is mantling and the mantle slow applies, mantle sliding immediately afterward is no longer allowed.
Subsequent CC reduction increased from 7%/21% to 8%/24%.
Survival Buff HP regen changed from 0.51.5% max HP to a flat 440 regen.
Gun Buff ammo increased from 2060% to 3570%.
Gun Buff now reloads your ammo when picked up.
Casting Buff spirit power increased from 1540 to 1565.
Casting Buff cooldown reduction rescaled from 1225% to 1220%.
Movement Buff stamina increased from 14 to 24.
Added new trooper anti-stuck behavior to fix spots where troopers could become stuck.
Fixed a bug where troopers could clip into the world while climbing stairs or navigating obstacles.
Golden Statue: Cooldown Reduction reduced from 0.75/1.0/1.5% to 0.5/0.75/1%
